Ваше питання: Please create react hook for pagination with dots

Відповідь: ```
import { useState } from "react";

const usePagination = (maxPages) => {
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);

  const resetPages = () => {
    setCurrentPage(1);
  };

  const goToNextPage = () => {
    if (currentPage < maxPages) {
      setCurrentPage((prevPage) => prevPage + 1);
    }
  };

  const goToPrevPage = () => {
    if (currentPage > 1) {
      setCurrentPage((prevPage) => prevPage - 1);
    }
  };

  return {
    currentPage,
    goToNextPage,
    goToPrevPage,
    resetPages,
  };
};

export default usePagination;
```
